actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ 0 || pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ 1'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(pactl get-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@) == "Mute: no" ]] && echo true || echo false'

actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && bluetoothctl power on || bluetoothctl power off'
actions.update-command: sh -c 'bluetoothctl show | grep -q "Powered: yes" && echo true || echo false'

actions.label: WiFi
actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && nmcli radio wifi on || nmcli radio wifi off'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(nmcli radio wifi) == "enabled" ]] && echo true || echo false'
